name: Asteroids-Demo
description:
A demo recreation of the classic space-themed shooter video game Asteroids, made with TwoDimensional game engine!

TwoDimensional game engine is a cross-platform, high performance 2D game engine that is currently in development.

For more information about the engine:

https://github.com/saebnaser/TwoDimensional.git

Source Code for the Asteroids demo:

https://github.com/saebnaser/Asteroids-Demo.git
